original_text: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord: he departed not from all the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who made Israel to sin.
korean_text: 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 한 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 모든 죄에서 떠나지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was evil
in the sight of the Lord
he departed not from all the sins of Jeroboam
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여로보암의 모든 죄를 떠나지 않았고
